name: Mista's Messy Mission
description:
Minor Spoilers for Part 5 - the power of a stand user.

Full Screen Recommended.

Before the events of Part 5, Bucciarati's group made a name for themselves within Passione. Play as Mista and infiltrate a rival group and eliminate their boss, but you'll need to fight through his goons first.

Controls:

WASD to move

E to place Sex Pistols at the mouse location

Left Click to Fire a Bullet

Right Click to Deflect a Bullet

Credits:

    - Andrew Way - Programmer

    - Jack Lair - Programmer

    - Ryan Sheeran - "Art"/Level Design

Imported Assets:

The music used is Proiettile created by Yugo Kanno all rights reserved.

Floor tiles were from Japanese City Game Assets by GuttyKreum - https://guttykreum.itch.io/japanese-town

Crate asset by PolygonixGames - https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-wooden-crate

Bullet Sound by Spybreak001 - https://drive.google.com/file/d/17tDg-8dAxMc85vruJ6QfCYHkQH1-u6BK/view

This project was created in Fair Use for the JoJo's Game Jam Part 2. All characters are the intellectual property of Hirohiko Araki, Jump Comics, Viz Media, and other license holders.
